alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Fairfield, Newberry and northeastern Saluda Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Joanna, or 12 miles northwest of Newberry, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Whitmire, Prosperity, Newberry College, Monticello, Newberry County Airport, Blair, Lake Greenwood, Pomaria, Silverstreet, US-176 and SC- 34 Crossroads, Belfast Wildlife Management Area, Hollywood Elementary School, Chappells Fire Station, Enoree Ranger District Office, Stoney Hill, Newberry County Detention Center, Mid- Carolina High School, Wyses Ferry, and Chappells. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 62 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
